objects.text:
• IR Reflection Technology
• Eco-friendly Formulation
• Reduces Indoor Temperature
• Easy Roof Application

product_details.name: Panache Cool Top Eco - Advanced Heat Reflective Roof Coating | 5KG
product_details.description:
• IR Reflection Technology for superior heat reduction
• Eco-friendly nano-technology formulation
• High SRI (Solar Reflective Index) rating for maximum cooling efficiency
• Easy roof application and coverage
• 5KG bucket size for extensive coverage
• Professional-grade cooling solution
• Weather-resistant and durable coating
• Reduces indoor temperature naturally
• Energy-saving solution for buildings
• Compatible with various roof surfaces
• Environment-friendly cooling solution
• Long-lasting thermal protection

banner_details:
The banner has a modern, product-focused design promoting a cooling roof product. It features a clean layout with a two-toned background divided diagonally into turquoise green and pale aqua blue with subtle grid lines. On the left side, the bold headline (id: "heading") and subheading (id: "subheading") are stacked vertically in large white font, emphasizing the product's name. Below them is a tagline (id: "tagline") in bright yellow that adds an energetic appeal. 

An informative bullet list (id: "description") communicates key features in dark teal. The price (id: "price") is prominently highlighted, and a vibrant rectangular call-to-action button (ids: "cta_background" and "cta") saying "Shop Now" draws immediate attention. On the right side, the product image (id: "product_image") adds visual authenticity and dominance.

**Color Palette:**
- Turquoise Green: #02A79A
- Pale Aqua Blue: #E8F5F5
- Dark Teal: #015E55
- Bright Yellow: #FFCC29
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image features a clean and modern color palette centered around cool, calming tones that reflect the product's purpose—thermal cooling. The dominant color is a bold teal green (#007F7E), symbolizing freshness and eco-friendliness, occupying most of the bucket's surface. A crisp white (#FFFFFF) is used for contrast, particularly in the background and large vertical "COOLING" text, enhancing visibility and cleanliness. The brand name and weight use a dark navy blue (#0F2B5B) for emphasis and legibility. Accents of lime green (#A4C639) in the logo add a pop of energy. These colors harmonize to project an image of innovation and environmental assurance.
